price: To Him belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is on earth, and all that is between them, and all that is beneath the soil.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحۡتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
